## `SetDolchAdverbsColor`

Sets the font color for Dolch adverbs in the formatted Dolch report.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetDolchAdverbsColor(string colorName)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`string` colorName | The name of the color to use. |
